content:
Naranaayu vannu-thirujanmatthaal
sabhaye kaattha- mashihaa dhanyan
Avakaashiyinnaa-llilava -tharichu;
Adimappettor-paadeedunnu;
Sthuthi the! Sthuthi the!-mariyaam suthane!
Purajaathikkaar-nirappinninnaall
Vijnyaanikallthan-bhavanam pooki.
Saumyokthikallum-goodhokthikallum
Ee naallettam-sphudamaayttheernnu.
/taarppodadiyaar-paadeedunnu
/tsthuthi the! Sthuthi the!-janakaathmajane!

Aamosu thanayan -pravachichathupol
Prasavichallo-kanyaka ee naall.
Nin pirannaallil-sthuthi ennevam
Sthuthi paadeedaam-namukkevarkkum.
Brakhyaaputhran -pravachichathupol
Namukkaayinnaall-danahaa udichu.
/taarppodadiyaar-paadeedunnu
/tsthuthi the! Sthuthi the!-janakaathmajane!

bhoovaasikallum-svarvaasikallum
Ee naallavane-sthothram cheythu.
Pathanam bhavicha-paavanayaaya
Sabhayinnaallil-mauliyuyartthi.
Nedunaall ninno-rasvaathantryam
Ee naall paade-dooreekrthamaay.
Paathaallatthil-paazhaayu poya
Roopam thellichaa-nee naall shilpi.
Aparanmaari-nnakame kayari
Avakaashikallaay-bhavane mevi.
/taarppodadiyaar-paadeedunnu
/tsthuthi the! Sthuthi the!-janakaathmajane!

Ee naalludayon-naathhan vellivaayu
Devanmaare-lajippichu
Ee naall vaidyan-saukhyam nalkaan
Rogaathurare-sandarshichu.
Aakalkkarusaa-than kottayinnaall
Paade podinyu-mudiyum vedinyaan
Komallanaaya-kanyaathanayan
Inne divasam-sevithanaayi.
Aarppodu nyangall-sthuthi paadunnu.
Vaazhvereedum-shishuve! Sthuthi the.
/taarppodadiyaar-paadeedunnu
/tsthuthi the! Sthuthi the!-janakaathmajane!
